name: MURK (itch)
description:
A reporter finds himself at an abandoned toy factory where he believes Satanist worship took place.  Discoverer the mystery or leave without a story.

Devs note -

I'm a solo developer and I work hard to try make good horror games. So if your up to it please donate, so I can have will, and encouragement to continue.

 Not like i'll ever stop just saying though. 

https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=ZCBRKAX69GS2E&item...
